why: A php client to show your dropbox account photos with a nice UI
storyParas: Sem 2 Web Data Management project - Dropbox File storage. Courtesy to prof. Leonidas Fegaras
Developed a php frontend client with which any user can configure his/her account with secret key to pull/push files from/to the configured dropbox storage
Not much of a UI guy, but I enjoyed every bit of frontend as much as the backend
Users can upload, download, delete, explore his/her account files in real time. Auth using token
